summary: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.
cast: Fernando Rey|Paul Frankeur|Delphine Seyrig|Bulle Ogier|Stéphane Audran|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Julien Bertheau|Milena Vukotic|Maria Gabriella Maione|Claude Piéplu|Muni|Pierre Maguelon|François Maistre|Michel Piccoli|Ellen Bahl|Christian Baltauss|Olivier Bauchet|Robert Benoît|Anne-Marie Deschodt|Jean-Michel Dhermay|Georges Douking|Jean Degrave|Sébastien Floche|François Guilloteau|Claude Jaeger|Jean-Claude Jarry|Pierre Lary|Robert Le Béal|Alix Mahieux|Bernard Musson|Maxence Mailfort|Robert Party|Jean Revel|Jacques Rispal|Amparo Soler Leal|Diane Vernon|Madeleine Bouchez|Roger Caccia
title: El discreto encanto de la burguesía
